name: Sacred Pool
description: A body of water blessed by divine power provides spiritual purification and healing properties. The holy nature offers protection and divine favor, while the religious significance can attract both worshippers and those seeking to exploit its power.
atmosphere: Crystal-clear water glows with divine light while sacred symbols are carved around the pool's marble edge. Religious artifacts and offerings surround the blessed waters as gentle lapping creates peaceful rhythms. The air carries pure scents of divine power and spiritual purification. Pilgrims often kneel beside the healing waters.
